title: Download the installer package for Operations Platform
content:
This topic lists the steps to download and extract Operations Platform chart and the Vertica database installer packages. This topic also lists the extracted installer package directory structure, and steps to verify the public key for helm chart signing and validate the chart signature.

Download and extract the Operations Platform installer package

  1. Go to the Software Licenses and Downloads website.
  2. Download the installer package with the name op-chart-<version>.zip.
  3. Accept the terms and conditions to download the installer package from the website. 
  4. Run the following command to unzip the op-chart-<version>.zip file: 
    unzip op-chart-<version>.zip
    After you unzip, in the op-chart > charts folder, you will see the following tgz files:

    itomdiopensearchoperator-<version>.tgz file. Use this if you're setting up OpenSearch for Text Data Analysis.
    op-<version>.tgz file. Use this to install Operations Platform.
  5. Depending on your Kubernetes distribution type, download one of the following OPTIC Management Toolkit package:
    OPTIC MANAGEMENT TOOLKIT PACKAGES FOR KUBERNETES DISTRIBUTION TYPE
    Kubernetes distribution Package
    For embedded Kubernetes OPTIC Management Toolkit for Embedded Kubernetes Installation and Upgrade
    For external Kubernetes

    OPTIC Management Toolkit for External Kubernetes Installation and Upgrade
  6. Run the following command to unzip the OPTIC Management Toolkit package: 
    unzip <OMT package>.zip

    For example: 

    unzip OMT2xx-xxx-15001-external-K8s.zip

    The unzipped package includes the following files:
    OMT_External_K8s_2x.x-xxx.zip
    OMT_External_K8s_2x.x-xxx.zip.sig

Download and extract the Vertica package

Follow these steps to download the Vertica installer files.

  1. Download the Vertica installer .rpm file and license file from the Software Licenses and Downloads website (requires Passport credentials), if not downloaded already. 
     
  2. Copy the installer and the license to a temporary directory, such as /tmp, on the system where you will install Vertica.

Directory structure of the installer package 

The unzipped file contains the following directories and files under op-chart:

DIRECTORY STRUCTURE OF INSTALLER PACKAGE
Directories/files Description
charts

Install charts (DO NOT extract):  

  • itomdiopensearchoperator-<version>.tgz
  • op-<version>.tgz
plugins
/udx-plugin/itom-di-pulsarudx-<version>.rpm
tools
/op-tms-cli/op-tms-cli-<version>.tar.gz
deployment
  • large-deployment.yaml  
  • low-footprint.yaml
  • medium-deployment.yaml
License.txt
samples
  • /aws/aws-values.yaml
  • /azure/azure-values.yaml
  • /gcp/gcp-values.yaml
  • /generic/generic-values.yaml
  • op-values.yaml
  • /openshift/openshift-values.yaml

  • /aws/AutoConfigAWS.sh
  • /aws/create_aws_repositories.py
  • /aws/image-transfer.py
  • /aws/loadbalancer-scripts/loadbalancer.sh
  • /aws/loadbalancer-scripts/rules_op.sh
  • /azure/AutoConfigAzure.sh
  • /database/DBSQLGenerator.sh
  • /backup-restore/pgbackup.sh
  • /backup-restore/pgrestore.sh
